column5: Sleek, clean, new modern private home with minimalist vibe tucked away in the Texas Hill Country near the tennis ranches (Newks & TBarM); minutes from San Antonio and Austin; only 8 miles from downtown New Braunfels, Schlitterbahn Water Park, Guadalupe and Comal rivers, and only 10 minutes from Historic Gruene. Enjoy all New Braunfels and Gruene have to offer and then come relax and rest in this peaceful and quiet space.
